thread.title: Tenable Network Security Wins Frost & Sullivan 2015 Technology Innovation Award for SecurityCenter Continuous View
thread.title_full: Tenable Network Security Wins Frost & Sullivan 2015 Technology Innovation Award for SecurityCenter Continuous View - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Tenable Network Security Wins Frost & Sullivan 2015 Technology Innovation Award for SecurityCenter Continuous View
text:
Tenable’s continuous network monitoring recognized for excellence in technology innovation by leading global analyst firm
Columbia, MD
Tenable Network Security®, Inc. , the leader in continuous network monitoring, has been recognized as the winner of Frost & Sullivan’s 2015 Technology Innovation Award for the company’s market-defining continuous network monitoring solution, SecurityCenter Continuous View.
“Tenable has always been a forward-looking company dedicated to building next generation security technology, even as we work with our customers to meet the security challenges of today,” said Ron Gula, CEO, Tenable Network Security. “We have an exceptionally talented team focused on pushing the boundaries of what’s possible for our products, and I couldn’t be more proud to accept this award on their behalf.”
For the Technology Innovation Award , Frost & Sullivan’s global team of analysts and consultants identified the top three companies that exhibit a best-in-class performance by consistently pursuing or investing in technologies that enable them to better serve their customers and exceed industry expectations. Through a rigorous 10-step process, candidates were evaluated on the elements of a successful growth strategy including superior leadership, technological innovation, customer service and strategic product development.
“Tenable’s SecurityCenter Continuous View platform combines active vulnerability management, passive vulnerability scanning, log correlation and analytics to provide real-time visibility into an organization’s defenses, vulnerabilities, threats and breaches,” said Chris Kissel, industry analyst, network security at Frost & Sullivan. “SecurityCenter CV offers analysis and investigation procedures, reporting templates that monitor movement inside the network, plus a known bad signatures library with more than 70,000 known vulnerabilities, all on a single console.”
Frost & Sullivan recognized Tenable’s SecurityCenter Continuous View for integrating perimeter defenses, analytics and heuristics with its combined active and passive vulnerability assessment platforms plus log correlation technology. Created for and used by some of the largest organizations in the world, SecurityCenter CV also offers scalability for small and mid-sized businesses, allowing them to reap the benefits of an integrated cyber defense strategy with high-level reporting.
To learn more about continuous network monitoring from Tenable Network Security, watch the Take Five with Continuous Network Monitoring explainer video.
For more information about SecurityCenter Continuous View, or to schedule a demo, visit the SecurityCenter Continuous View product page .
About Tenable Network Security
Tenable Network Security provides continuous network monitoring to identify vulnerabilities, reduce risk, ensure compliance and respond to threats. Our family of products includes SecurityCenter Continuous View, which provides the most comprehensive and integrated view of network health, and Nessus®, the global standard in detecting and assessing network data. Tenable is relied upon by many of the world’s largest corporations, not-for-profit organizations and public sector agencies, including the entire U.S. Department of Defense. For more information, please visit tenable.com .
